name: Polygon Gangster Crime Auto
description:
Gangs, crimes, mafia - it's your life.

History:
You are a low-poly gangster in Grand Poly City. Nobody loves you and does not respect you as a person. From the very childhood, your parents forgot you for the whole day. On a summer vacation instead of a children's camp, you were sent to Colombia in the company of Spanish immigrants, bandits, and thieves. In the school years, stealing auto was just as common as necessary. All sorts of mafia bosses became your lord at that time. You ate poisoned fruit, drank water from puddles, slept in the hay or in the stolen auto. But its only a story. Now you are the boss.

Car theft:
- Well, what game about car theft can be, without riding on a theft tank or stealing citizens auto?
- Maybe you would like to theft helicopter from a military base?
- In Grand Poly City you can steal and do whatever you want. It could be every citizen auto, military auto or machine.

Open world:
A large low polygonal city is full of chests and surprises that you must find, otherwise, you just will not become the Polygon lord of the notorious criminal underworld. Collect loot from opponents, collect coins and power-ups. For found coins, you can always buy the coolest and most dangerous weapons in the weapons shop.

Powerful weapon:
- Machine gun
- Shotgun
- Pistol
- Sniper rifle
- Grenade launcher
- Hand grenade

More powerful weapon and adds:
- flammable missile launcher
- flamethrower
- gold desert eagle
- jet-pack

So go and rule the city in your way!
